document.masterDocTitle: A Catalogue and Historical Study of the Odonata of Ecuador

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Catalogue and Historical Study of the Odonata of Ecuador

bibRefCitation.author: Kirby, W. F.
bibRefCitation.refString: Kirby, W. F. (1889) A revision of the subfamily Libellulinae, with descriptions of new genera and species. Transactions of the Zoological Society of London, 12 (9), 249 - 348. https: // doi. org / 10.1111 / j. 1096 - 3642.1889. tb 00016. x

subSubSection.paragraph:
Of the five species of
Tauriphila
, three were keyed by
Needham et al. (2014)
, two of which are wide-ranging and are found in Ecuador ( Fig. 112 ). Breeding sites are open ponds and small lakes with aquatic macrophytes.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 112.
Tauriphila argo
♂, BRAZIL, Río de Janeiro, Atlantic Forest, Reserva Ecologica de Guapiaçu,1 iv 2015; photo B. Guillon.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Tauriphila argo (Hagen, 1869)
. Publ. Recs. ECU : (H06), (P11), (H14); GY : Tennessen & Johnson (2008) ; NA : Tennessen (1998) ; OR : * Dunkle (1981) . Also ARG, BOL, BRA, CEN, COL, GUF, GUY, PRY, PER, VEN, TTO: (H06), (P11); plus SUR (P16).

Addl. Data. GY, Balao : 1 ♂ , small stream/ditches in banana plantation, about 2 km E of Hwy. 25 near Balao Jct. ( -2.9100 , -79.6919 , 70m ), 28 iii 2008 , leg. & det. JTJ [JTJ]; 1 ♂ , same data but leg. & det. KJT [KJT]; NA , Tena : 1 ♂ , Puerto Napo , 5.3 km E of Hwy. 45 on J.S.B.S. Road, Río Sinde ( -1.0500 , -77.7481 , 450m ), 22 vi 1996 , leg. & det. Tauriphila australis (Hagen,1867)
. Publ. Recs. ECU : Paulson (1983) , Tsuda (1986 , 1991 ); Steinmann (1997b) , (H06), (P11), (H14); EO : Campos (1927) ; GY : * Calvert (1906) , Ris (1913b) , Campos (1922) ; SU : Westfall (1998) . Also ARG, BOL, BRA, CEN, COL, PER, TTO, VEN: (H06), (P11); Plus GUF, PRY: (H06).

Addl. Data. GY, Guayaquil: 1 ♀ , Guayaquil, date?, F. Campos, det.? [USNM]; Naranjal : 1 ♂ , Cerro Mas Vale Fundacion Andrate (-2.40, -79.63, 15m ), 10 ii 2001 , leg. & det. F.
